list.definition: show tag values from FIEnvStats with key=domain where $timeFilter
list.label: UCS Domain
list.name: domain
list.query: show tag values from FIEnvStats with key=domain where $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from FIServerPortStats with key=port where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and channel != '' and $timeFilter
list.label: Server Port
list.name: server_port
list.query: show tag values from FIServerPortStats with key=port where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and channel != '' and $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from FIServerPortStats with key=to_chassis where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and port =~ /$server_port/ and  $timeFilter
list.label: Chassis
list.name: chassis
list.query: show tag values from FIServerPortStats with key=to_chassis where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and port =~ /$server_port/ and  $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from BackplanePortStats with key=bp_port where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and chassis =~ /$chassis/ and channel != ''  and $timeFilter
list.label: Backplane Port
list.name: bp_port
list.query: show tag values from BackplanePortStats with key=bp_port where domain =~ /$domain/ and fi_id =~ /$fi_id/ and chassis =~ /$chassis/ and channel != ''  and $timeFilter
